name: Scent of Aurora
description:
This is a classic love story between Selene and Aurora. Selene is a typical patriot with a deep passion for guns. His girlfriend Aurora however completely loathes all guns and violence in general. One day she gets fed up with it and does something drastic to prompt a change. It then becomes quite an adventure and an impactful day for Selene...

How to play

The controls are given in game too. Can be played with only mouse or using keyboard alternative too.

Made with
  • Unity 2019
  • JetBrains Rider
  • krita
  • Bfxr
  • GarageBand
